Markov clustering related functions¶

Python functions that wrap mcl, the Markov clustering algorithm invented and developed by Stijn Van Dongen. (Stijn van Dongen, Graph Clustering by Flow Simulation. PhD thesis, University of Utrecht, May 2000.)

Arthur Zwaenepoel

Markov clustering (MCL) related functions

wgd.mcl._ava_blast_to_abc(ava_file, regex='.+', prefix=None, col_1=0, col_2=1, col_3=2)¶

Convert tab separated all-vs-all (ava) Blast results to an input graph for mcl.

Parameters:
  • prefix – prefix for genes of interest (optional), e.g. ‘arat’ for ‘arat|AT1G001290’.
  • regex – regular expression for parsing genes of interest (optional), e.g. ‘AT.+’ for ‘AT1G001290’.
  • ava_file – all-vs-all Blast results file (tab separated)
  • pipe – boolean, piped prefix or not? (see species parameter)
  • col_1 – column in file for gene 1 (starts from 0)
  • col_2 – column in file for gene 2
  • col_3 – column in file for e-value (weight in graph)
Returns:

graph in abc format for mcl
wgd.mcl.all_v_all_blast(seq_file, output_directory, eval_cutoff=1e-10)¶

Perform all-versus-all Blastp.

Parameters:
  • seq_file – fasta file with protein sequences
  • output_directory – output directory
  • eval_cutoff – e-value cut off for Blastp results
Returns:

all-versus-all Blastp results
wgd.mcl.run_mcl_ava(input_file, regex='.+', prefix=None, tmp_dir='./', output_file='mcl.out', inflation=2, return_dict=False, preserve=True, **kwargs)¶

Run mcl on all-vs-all Blast results for a species of interest. Note if the parameter output_file is not given and the parameter return_dict is set to True, only a python dictionary is returned and no file is written.

Parameters:
  • prefix – prefix for genes of interest (optional), e.g. ‘arat’ for ‘arat|AT1G001290’.
  • regex – regular expression for parsing genes of interest (optional), e.g. ‘AT.+’ for ‘AT1G001290’.
  • input_file – all-vs-all Blast input file
  • tmp_dir – directory to store temporary/intermediate files
  • output_file – output_file (optional)
  • inflation – inflation factor for mcl
  • return_dict – boolean, return results as dictionary?
  • preserve – boolean, preserve tmp/intermediate files?
  • kwargs – other arguments for _ava_blast_to_abc()
Returns:

results as output file or as gene family dictionary
